phrs.translation: 轻率, 火急, 性急

sentences.sentence: I was heartily ashamed of my hastiness.
sentences.translation: 我从内心里为我的仓促而害臊。

sentences.sentence: And I will be on guard against two evils: hastiness and indecision.
sentences.translation: 而且我将防范两个邪恶：草率、优柔寡断。

sentences.sentence: We avoid tardiness, and we should also avoid hastiness and anxiety. We do a good job, and the same time, we enjoy a good life.
sentences.translation: 我们要杜绝拖拉，同时我们也要避免毛躁和焦虑，我们做好工作的同时也好享受自己的人生。
